title: Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar: SP Dr Vijaykumar Rathod Stresses AI Use, Legal Knowledge In Crime Investigation
description: Dr Rathod further said that the nature of crime is changing and the criminals are adopting new means to commit crime. Cyber crimes have increased considerably. Hence, it is important that new technology like Artificial Intelligence (AI) should be implemented in the investigation of cases
content: Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar: Superintendent of Police (SP) Dr Vinaykumar Rathod directed the investigating officers and head constables to conduct the investigation of the crimes with proper study of law during the investigation. He was speaking during... [1969 chars]

title: Growing up in the last century: Blowing your mind with a Gen X time warp in Our Best Life
description: The big change for us 1980 babies is the technological revolution, from computers to fax machines to email to social media to artificial intelligence.
content:
CLEVELAND, Ohio – When I was born in 1980, 45-year-olds were born in 1935. That’s the equivalent age gap of me and a baby born today.
My sister recently blew my mind with this fact.
It was more shocking than realizing that when the Wonder Years premi... [3596 chars]

title: Wearable Devices Secures U.S. Patent for Breakthrough Voice and Gesture Control Technology, Enhancing Leadership in AI Wearables Market
description: Yokneam Illit, Israel, Sept. 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Wearable Devices Ltd. (Nasdaq: WLDS, WLDSW) (the 'Company” or 'Wearable Devices”), a technology growth company specializing in artificial intelligence ('AI”)-powered touchless sensing wearables, today announced that the United States Patent and Trademark Office has granted a significant patent titled 'Gesture and Voice-Controlled Interface Device” which covers a groundbreaking technology that integrates gesture recognition and voice control, enhanced by biometric authentication.
content: Yokneam Illit, Israel, Sept. 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Wearable Devices Ltd. (Nasdaq: WLDS, WLDSW) (the "Company” or "Wearable Devices”), a technology growth company specializing in artificial intelligence ("AI”)-powered touchless sensing wearable... [7321 chars]

title: Solving AI and copyright issue ‘will not be kicked into long grass’, says Nandy
description: The Culture Secretary told MPs that the debate on artificial intelligence and its impact on creatives had become binary and promised a new approach.
content:
Culture Secretary Lisa Nandy said the challenge of addressing AI and copyright would not be “kicked into the long grass” as she admitted Government shortcomings in trying to legislate.
Ms Nandy said minsters had failed to ensure the debate did not be... [3404 chars]

title: AI infrastructure company Nebius to raise $3 billion to fuel growth
description: Nebius Group said on Wednesday it would raise $3 billion to fuel growth in its core artificial intelligence cloud business, on the heels of its $17.4-billion deal with Microsoft .
content:
The financing includes a $2 billion private offering of convertible senior notes and a $1 billion underwritten public offering of the company's class A shares.
Sign up here.
